Determine the optimal time for harvesting based on grain maturity

Thresh the grain to remove it from the stalks

Monitor the growth stages to time agricultural practices appropriately

Plan the soil and nutrient management for optimal crop growth
Choose suitable grain varieties based on soil and climate conditions
Schedule irrigation, fertilization, and other field operations

Use a combine harvester for efficient grain harvesting
Clean and maintain farm equipment regularly
Clean and sort the grain using grading, sieving, and other methods
Hull or remove bran layers as needed
Mill or grind the grain into flour or meal
Toast or parboil grains if required for certain processing methods
